name: PawnHero Philippines Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of an online banking platform designed to provide short-term loans to small business owners and unbanked people. The company's platform offers a convenient alternative to traditional brick-and-mortar pawnshops, enabling clients to get financial assistance without opening bank accounts.
one_liner: Developer of an online banking platform designed to provide short-term loans to small business owners and unbanked people. The company's platform offers a convenient alternative to traditional brick-and-mortar pawnshops, enabling clients to get financial assistance without opening bank accounts.
